title: Broom
description:
A traditional broom, as used for sweeping—or ridden by a witch. Shown at a 45° angle, with a wooden handle and yellow bristles at the lower left.

Commonly used for various content concerning cleaning, brushing, and figurative sweeps (e.g., in sports or awards). Not to be confused with üñåÔ∏è Paintbrush.
apple_vendor_description: The broom emoji on Apple devices is depicted with a sturdy wooden handle and a full, bristly head of straw, showcasing Apple's commitment to realistic textures and soft rounded edges. Subtle highlights and shadows create a sense of depth and volume, making it look ready for use. This emoji effectively symbolizes cleaning, tidying up, or even a fresh start, often used in contexts related to household chores or decluttering. Its clean and straightforward design on Apple devices makes its meaning instantly clear in any digital communication.
